comments.author: John feilds

comments.text:
it seems that most of the comments here are as moronic as the two clowns 
presenting the video.

What is it that seems so crazy to you? If somebody makes up a story that 
mocks and ridicules you and tells/shows it to millions of people, why 
wouldn't you want to get back at them? If it was me I would certainly want 
to.

So why the stupid slack jawed looks of incredulity on faces when the 
Scientology lunatics do it?

What's so shocking about the Scientology dudes going through Matt and 
Trey;s garbage? The police, the FBI, journalists and Private Investigators 
all routinely do this to look for evidence and have done for decades. 

The same goes for planting a mole within an organization to get 
information. That's been going on since Roman times

If you provoke and mock somebody or something  for no particular reason - 
expect a reaction.from them. It really isn't that hard to understand.﻿

comments.text:
Wow, I just about squeezed out a tear after reading that. All those insults 
were very much pointless, I re-read your original comment and realize that 
you weren't saying anything about Trey and Matt, and apologize for being an 
ass. Have a good day sir.
comments.author: Towelie

comments.text:
+Matty D
Well you've just demonstrated what an ignorant, dull witted, homofaggot, 
roody poo you are. So congratulations.

If you were about 50% less of mattress stain than you are you might have 
deduced from reading my comment that I was not objecting in any way to the 
cartoon or i\t's creators or the subject of the cartoon.  Now do you 
understand that or do you need me to draw you some pictures?

So your ramblings about how good the cartoon is and why the creators make 
them is irrelevant background noise. 

My criticism is of the presenters of this video and their fake sense of 
shock and confusion over why the Scientology nuts might want to get back at 
the writers or producers of the show. 

Now I don't want to close on a sour note here but regarding you liking the 
Virgin Mary episode. You come on hear insulting me and banging on about 
shit that's only relevant in your own 'mind' and you expect me to have some 
kind of interest in which cartoons you like. Sorry - that dog won't hunt 
Monsignor.
comments.author: TheSmithDorian

comments.text:
+TheSmithDorian
Get your head out of your ass it's a fucking cartoon, a brilliant one at 
that, they do it for humor and as well as showing the way some people in 
this world view certain religions/events/topics. You sound like somebody 
who gets overworked by harmless comedy. It's sad really, meanwhile I get 
quite a few laughs out of it, have you seen the episode where the Virgin 
Mary shits blood on the popes face? Eh, I won't lose any sleep.
comments.author: Towelie

comments.text:
+Matt Volkening
Thanks for that input Matt. It's always good to get an original perspective 
on the issues 

These days there are far too many people out there posting irrelevant 
nonsense and childish non-comments on You Tube. So it's very refreshing to 
see a well thought out and structured argument like you present here.  The 
way that you switch from point to counter point and then back again, while 
staying within the overall bounds of the original premise was not 
dissimilar to Euripides or Hippolytus.

Brilliant stuff.
